original_title: Riblja Čorba - Niko nema ovakve ljude
overview: Niko nema ovakve ljude! (trans. No One Has This Kind of People!) is the live/video album by Serbian rock band Riblja Čorba, released in 2010. The album was recorded on the band's concert held on October 10, 2010 in Belgrade Arena. The album featured two CDs and one DVD with the recording of the concert.
title: Riblja Čorba: No One Has This Kind of People!
